title: Bear's New Friend
description: Bear is going to the swimming hole, but first he must find his friends.There's a clatter in the tree! Is it Mouse? No . . ."Who?" calls Bear.Something quickly scampers by! Is it Hare? No . . ."Who?" calls Bear.Someone seems to be hiding from Bear and his friends. Who is it? WHO?How Bear and his forest friends discover a NEW FRIEND will enchant young readers. Karma Wilson's playful text and Jane Chapman's radiant illustrations make Bear's New Friend a perfect summertime read-aloud companion to the bestselling Bear Snores On .
author: Karma Wilson
